name: recruitment-comprehensive-b
description: ## Summary Show your skills! Here are some skills that all Codesmith graduates should have before moving on. There are 5 parts, each in their own directory. Follow the directions in this README for instructions on each part.

scripts.lint: node test/lint.js part-1/main.js part-2/main.js part-3/main.js part-4/main.js
scripts.test: mocha --timeout 5000 -R mocha-email-reporter -O json=test/output.json test/part-1.js test/part-2.js test/part-3.js test/part-4.js
